entry.value: Use pandas merge to perform a SQL like join on two tables.

from pandas import merge%%00010%%00010# Assign inputs to left/right%%00010left_table = input_table_1%%00010right_table = input_table_2%%00010%%00010# Choose a column name to join on%%00010%%00010join_key = 'Cluster Membership'%%00010%%00010# Choose a join method left/right/inner/outer%%00010join_method = 'right'%%00010%%00010# use pandas::merge to do a SQL like join. %%00010output_table = merge(left_table,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 right_table, %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 how=join_method, %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 on = join_key)
